name: Pop Pop Flying Bieber - Flap the hair and save me from Spiders and Selena
name_original: Pop Pop Flying Bieber - Flap the hair and save me from Spiders and Selena
description:
Tap to Flap the hairdo and save Bieber from Gomez & Spiders cos he is really afraid of both of them .

Try to beat the best score on Game centre
